description: I spent six months at PS+FS and sister studio PSSS working on internal communications to build an onboarding program, assist with some social media content creation and copywriting, collaborate on email marketing, and write educational blogs for their website.
Worked with the Clint Newman, D.D.S. team on updating their website copy, monthly articles, social media management + content creation, and minimal PR.

I began working with Marathon in March 2020 to rebrand their social media platforms + create content, update their website structure + write digital copy, and assist in event marketing efforts. Additionally, I head their internal communications as they expand.
I worked with Dental Bliss to update their website copy, manage their social media pages, and write educationl blog content.
For Snodgrass-King, I tackled social media content creation and managed all of their social media platforms. Additionally, I wrote monthly educational blogs for their website.
While working with The Cochran Firm, I mainly updated their website copy and wrote educational blogs.
At Gulch Dental Studio, I lead digital marketing endeavors from social media content creation and management, educational blog writing, website copywriting, and minimal PR efforts.
I spent my time with Pensacola Wellness running their social media and writing educational blogs for their website.
